title: Radisson Group to open new hotel in Ayodhya ahead of Ram Temple consecration ceremony
description: Radisson Hotel Group is set to open Park Inn by Radisson Ayodhya, a hotel in the sacred city of Ayodhya, offering exceptional hospitality experiences. The hotel is conveniently accessible by car or taxi from Maharishi Valmiki International Airport and Ayodhya Cantt Railway Station. It is in close proximity to notable landmarks such as Ram Janmabhoomi Temple, The Hanuman Garhi Temple, and Sita ki Rasoi.
